New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五 10:12:04 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Fire in Ashburton that burned building contained, multiple fire crews remain on site https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fire-in-ashburton-burns-building-six-trucks-respond-battle-on-multiple-fronts/POEHBP5SVNHL3HZEGSVAKVBUBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fire-in-ashburton-burns-building-six-trucks-respond-battle-on-multiple-fronts/POEHBP5SVNHL3HZEGSVAKVBUBM/ Blaze burned building and line of hedge but firefighters say it is now contained. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 08:24:43 +0000 Fire and Emergency said a rural fire truck, four tankers and several other support vehicles were called to the blaze about 5.30pm today. Photo / Fenz Mid-South Canterbury
Auckland St Peter’s College student is top of the world in religious studies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-st-peters-college-student-is-top-of-the-world-in-religious-studies/PEVV5OUHBNCX7KTFBG6HQA5H5Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-st-peters-college-student-is-top-of-the-world-in-religious-studies/PEVV5OUHBNCX7KTFBG6HQA5H5Q/ Christian Domilies aced his exams and got the world's highest score in religious studies. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 08:18:52 +0000 St Peter's College Year 12 student Christian Domilies got the highest score in religious studies in the world for his Cambridge exams in 2023. Photo / Facebook / St Peter's College Auckland
Bottles of Bee alcoholic lemonade supplied to Dunedin student flat, police investigating https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bottles-of-bee-酒精-柠檬水-supplied-to-dunedin-student-flat-police-investigating/V4QK7SQUY5FWXP2NY53A6H45OA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bottles-of-bee-酒精-柠檬水-supplied-to-dunedin-student-flat-police-investigating/V4QK7SQUY5FWXP2NY53A6H45OA/ Liquor company allegedly sought promotion on social media in exchange for booze. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 07:50:03 +0000 Police are making inquiries after liquor company Bee Alcoholic Lemonade supplied hundreds of bottles of its product to a student flat in Castle St, Dunedin, in exchange for promotion on social media. Photo / Otago Daily Times
Nicholas Cooper jailed for strangling woman, sexual recordings of children, preying on sleeping teen and vile videos https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/nicholas-cooper-jailed-for-strangling-woman-sex-recordings-of-children-preying-on-sleeping-teen-and-vile-videos/ 37OL3O7RFZD5LPJAXNC6U2MO3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/nicholas-cooper-jailed-for-strangling-woman-sex-recordings-of-children-preying-on-sleeping-teen-and-vile-videos/ 37OL3O7RFZD5LPJAXNC6U2MO3Y/ Craig Kapitan“I have felt soulless ever since," one of his many victims said. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:46:38 +0000 Nicholas Craig Cooper appears in the Auckland District Court for sentencing after pleading guilty to sexual abuse of a baby and many other crimes involving sexual and physical violence. Photo / Alex Burton
US Government thinks New Zealand may be next market for deadly drug fentanyl https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-government-thinks-new-zealand-may-be-next-market-for-deadly-drug-fentanyl/SGXKYIUC7FAL7CXG7DHQQLXC4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-government-thinks-new-zealand-may-be-next-market-for-deadly-drug-fentanyl/SGXKYIUC7FAL7CXG7DHQQLXC4Q/ David WilliamsIn 2022, 12 people in Masterton overdosed on fentanyl within 48 hours. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:34:43 +0000 The synthetic opioid fentanyl left 70,000 dead in the United States last year. Photo / 123rf
Judge sentences defiant suspended driver over Auckland and Nelson incidents https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/is-this-new-zeallands-worst-suspended-driver/MXZ5CF5SDRAOHGSVONMUOZRVHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/is-this-new-zeallands-worst-suspended-driver/MXZ5CF5SDRAOHGSVONMUOZRVHM/ Tracy NealAshlee Broomfield crashed his motorbike and left his pillion passenger at the scene. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Ashlee Daniel Broomfield has been sentenced on a range of charges, including one where he crashed his motorbike in Auckland and left the scene without his pillion passenger.
Crane Cooke jailed for $180k theft from mother in Waikato dementia care facility https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/crane-cooke-jailed-for-180k-theft-from-mother-in-waikato-dementia-care-facility/NESS5TMZ3RFJVKEUYGI3U5VQ6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/crane-cooke-jailed-for-180k-theft-from-mother-in-waikato-dementia-care-facility/NESS5TMZ3RFJVKEUYGI3U5VQ6I/ Craig KapitanThe building project manager also punched an elderly man in the face. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Crane Cooke was sentenced to prison after stealing $180,000 from his mother, punching an elderly employer and repeated drink driving offences.
Former world champion athlete pleads not guilty to drug charges in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-world-champion-athlete-pleads-not-guilty-to-drug-charges-in-auckland/X5AU4YXRQBBKJMKUK3W6GCDSGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-world-champion-athlete-pleads-not-guilty-to-drug-charges-in-auckland/X5AU4YXRQBBKJMKUK3W6GCDSGI/ Finn BlackwellThe athlete has elected trial by jury and been remanded in custody. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 04:39:20 +0000 The former world champion athlete is charged with importing cocaine and possession of cocaine for supply. Photo / RNZ
Supermarket shoplifter back in jail after being told Nelson stores ‘sick of people like you’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/supermarket-shoplifter-back-in-jail-after-being-told-nelson-stores-sick-of-people-like-you/YPVYCRXIYNHXXO2YQ6MMKYEVKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/supermarket-shoplifter-back-in-jail-after-being-told-nelson-stores-sick-of-people-like-you/YPVYCRXIYNHXXO2YQ6MMKYEVKA/ Tracy NealThe judge told the recidivist thief supermarkets were sick of people like him. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 04:26:54 +0000 Meat thief James Weir at an earlier sentencing in the Nelson District Court. He was sentenced again this week and was told to get a job after his latest bout of shoplifting from supermarkets. Photo / Tracy Neal
Government’s Three Waters replacement worries, frustrates local mayors - On the Tiles: Local Edition https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/governments- Three-waters-replacement-worries-frusstrates-local-mayors-on-the-tiles-local-edition/EXZB42UFA5G5PIR7ETM4PMDMTQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/governments- Three-waters-replacement-worries-frusstrates-local-mayors-on-the-tiles-local-edition/EXZB42UFA5G5PIR7ETM4PMDMTQ/One Mayor warns they are now facing 4 years of 14 percent rate rises Fri, 16 Feb 2024 04:23:49 +0000 Local Government Minister Simeon Brown during the post-Cabinet press conference with Prime Minister Christopher Luxon announcing the repeal of Three Waters. Photo / Mark Mitchell
